game.name: Freegglers
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Freegglers is an action-platformer with unique, funny and chaotic, flexible, physics-base movement of the main character. Train, jump, fight and find the escape hole inside the maze of traps, rescue your fellow Freegglers who suffer under the tyranny of Evil Freaks.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Freegglers is an action-platformer with unique, funny and chaotic, flexible, physics-base movement of the main character. Train, jump, fight and find the escape hole inside the maze of traps, rescue your fellow Freegglers who suffer under the tyranny of Evil Freaks.
